title: Lovecraft Country
creator_credit: Dana Robin, Christina Varotsis, Warner Bros. Television, Monkeypaw Productions and Bad Robot
brief_description: The anthology horror series follows 25-year-old Atticus Freeman, who joins up with his friend Letitia and his Uncle George to embark on a road trip across 1950s Jim Crow America to find his missing father.

constellations_other.name: The world's end
constellations_other.description: For people of colour oppressed by systemic racism, genre stories about the end of the world and cosmological monsters can be used to re-examine race and the injustices faced in real life.

creator_credit_for_label: Dana Robin, Christina Varotsis, Warner Bros. Television, Monkeypaw Productions and Bad Robot
description: The anthology horror series follows 25-year-old Atticus Freeman, who joins up with his friend Letitia and his Uncle George to embark on a road trip across 1950s Jim Crow America to find his missing father. They must survive and overcome both the racist terrors of white America and the malevolent spirits that could be ripped from a Lovecraft paperback.
description_for_label: The anthology horror series follows 25-year-old Atticus Freeman, who joins up with his friend Letitia and his Uncle George to embark on a road trip across 1950s Jim Crow America to find his missing father. They must survive and overcome both the racist terrors of white America and the malevolent spirits that could be ripped from a Lovecraft paperback.
